description:
A battle between Gold Saints is said to be a battle of a thousand days, a fight that always 
end in a stalemate!  The fight between Aquarius and Libra Genbu will rock the young Saints to their very core.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retrouvailles à la maison de la Balance. Chevalier d`or contre Chevalier d`or !
Reunion at the House of Libra! A Battle of Gold Versus Gold!
Tenbinkyuu no Saikai! Gekitotsu, Gold tai Gold!
天秤宮の再会! 激突, 黄金対黄金!
